titleStmt.title: Popery, a great mystery of iniquity proved in a sermon preached in the parish church of Newland, in the county of Glocester, on Wednesday the 22d. of December, 1680, being the fast-day appointed by the Kings proclamation ... / by Thomas Jekyll ...
titleStmt.author: Jekyll, Thomas, 1646-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
